mapper.insert: insert into reservation ( reservation_id, user_id, store_seq, reservation_date, reservation_time, num_guests, status, created_at, updated_at ) values ( reservation_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{storeSeq}, #{reservationDate}, #{reservationTime}, #{numGuests}, 'pending', sysdate, null )
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, s.name AS storeName FROM reservation r JOIN store s ON r.store_seq = s.store_seq WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.reservation_date DESC, reservation_time desc
